modules.description: This module provides operations to validate characters according to a given encoding, compare them, check equality, and decode their Unicode representation. It works with characters and a specific encoding type to ensure correctness in handling encoded scalar values. Concrete use cases include validating and decoding characters in custom text processing pipelines or encoding conversion tools.

Performs a left fold over the characters of a string, using a specified encoding, with optional offset and length parameters to process substrings. It works with strings and encoding-aware folder functions that track position and characters. Useful for parsing or transforming encoded text ranges, such as extracting tokens or calculating checksums over specific string segments.

This module decodes text from various ISO 8859 encodings into Unicode, supporting input from strings, channels, or manual sources, and allows inspection of decoder state and byte counts. It includes a submodule for validating, comparing, and decoding individual characters according to a specific encoding, enabling precise handling of encoded scalar values in custom text pipelines or conversion tools. Another submodule performs left folds over encoded strings, processing substrings with optional offsets and lengths, ideal for parsing or transforming specific text segments like token extraction or checksum calculation. Together, these components provide a comprehensive interface for converting, inspecting, and processing legacy ISO 8859 encoded text into modern Unicode workflows.
